rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space with natural ventilation and ample light, located adjacent to the living area.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design incorporating natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, designed for efficient workflow as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with an emphasis on light and ventilation. Features large windows to bring in natural sunlight.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation. Includes an attached ensuite bathroom.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom for the master bedroom, designed with natural light where possible.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater space with acoustically treated walls and ambient lighting, designed to balance natural light without disturbing the cinematic experience.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area for laundry, storage and other utilities. Designed to maintain airflow.
